briefdescription.para: Transfer complete callback for i2s master over spi.
Initialization for i2s master over spi.
Check if i2s master over spiis busy.

detaileddescription.para: This function determines whether the I2S-over-SPI master device is currently busy transmitting data. It is typically used during I2S communication to ensure that the device is not processing data, thus avoiding data conflicts or overwriting.

simplesect.para: Returns a bool value indicating the transmission status of the I2S-over-SPI master device. Returns true if the device is busy, and false if the device is idle.

memberdef.argsstring: (hpm_i2s_over_spi_t *i2s, uint8_t protocol, uint32_t lrck_hz, uint8_t audio_depth, uint8_t *data, uint32_t size)
memberdef.name: hpm_i2s_master_over_spi_tx_buffer_nonblocking

detaileddescription.para: Transmit for i2s master over spi in a non-blocking.

This function initializes and starts a transmission operation to send audio data to an I2S Over SPI master mode device via the SPI interface without blocking the current execution flow until the transfer is complete.

parameterdescription.para: i2s protocol, only support I2S_PROTOCOL_MSB_JUSTIFIED I2S_PROTOCOL_LSB_JUSTIFIED
switch left and right channels frequency, unit: hz
Pointer to the audio data to be transmitted.
Total size of the audio data to be transmitted in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (hpm_i2s_over_spi_t *i2s, uint8_t protocol, uint32_t lrck_hz, uint8_t audio_depth, uint8_t *data, uint32_t size)

switch left and right channels frequency, unit: hz

memberdef.argsstring: (hpm_i2s_over_spi_t *i2s, uint8_t protocol, uint32_t lrck_hz, uint32_t audio_depth, uint8_t *buffer0, uint8_t *buffer1, uint32_t size)
